name: Dried Fruit and Fresh Berry Salad
keywords: berries, grape, peach, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, dessert
recipeIngredient: 8 cups seedless grapes (about 3 pounds), stemmed and halved
10 firm, ripe peaches, pitted and cut into 1-inch-thick slices
Fresh fruit like strawberries, blueberries and huckleberries

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 275 degrees. Oil 4 baking sheets well and divide the grapes between 2 sheets and the peaches between 2 sheets. Bake until the fruit has reduced by about two-thirds (it should still be somewhat soft and juicy), about 2 to 3 hours; the grapes may be done sooner than the peaches.
Let cool and combine the grapes and peaches. Toss with fresh fruit like strawberries, blueberries and huckleberries before serving.
